channel.title: Doctor tell me
channel.description:
Weekly interviews with a Minneapolis-St. Paul area doctor about a current medical issue. Interviews conducted by Audrey June Booth of KUOM (Radio station : Minneapolis, Minn.) .,Weekly interviews with a Minneapolis-St. Paul area doctor about a current medical issue.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: New blood channels in the heart
item.description: Program number 335 asks how successful experiments have been to create new blood channels to the heart.
